about_the_game:
Dungeons & Dragons: The Tortle Package


Tomb of Annihilation Supplement

The Snout of Omgar is a geographical region described briefly in Tomb of Annihilation.

Not much is revealed about the location or its inhabitants in that adventure, however. The Tortle Package is written for Dungeon Masters who want to know more about the Snout of Omgar.

This supplement also introduces a new playable character race, the tortle, and a new adventure location: Dangwaru, the Typhoon Palace. All of this is permissible for play within the D&D Adventurers League.

All proceeds to Wizards of the Coast from this product are to be contributed to ExtraLife. You can head to the D&D page on Extra Life to find out more.

About Extra Life:

Extra Life unites thousands of gamers around the world to play games in support of their local Children's Miracle Network Hospital. Since its inception in 2008, Extra Life has raised more than $30 million for sick and injured kids. Sign up today and dedicate a day of play for kids in your community!

This product includes:

  • A new playable race, the Tortle. Which has been implemented in Fantasy Grounds to allow quick character creation.
  • 3 explorable Maps, in both keyed and unkeyed formats.
  • A sharable players module that allows access to the new playable race, the Tortle.
  • 2 new magic items.
  • 4 new creatures including: Geonid, Decapus, Topi, and Tortle
  • 6 new locations detailed with area descriptions, encounters, treasure, and traps

By Wizards RPG Team.

Released on September 30, 2017. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.2.2 and higher.

Requirements: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and the built-in 5E Ruleset.

Recommended: D&D Dungeon Master's Guide, D&D Player's Handbook, and D&D Tomb of Annihilation

Tomb of Annihilation Supplement

The Snout of Omgar is a geographical region described briefly in Tomb of Annihilation.

Not much is revealed about the location or its inhabitants in that adventure, however. The Tortle Package is written for Dungeon Masters who want to know more about the Snout of Omgar.

This supplement also introduces a new playable character race, the tortle, and a new adventure location: Dangwaru, the Typhoon Palace. All of this is permissible for play within the D&D Adventurers League.

All proceeds to Wizards of the Coast from this product are to be contributed to ExtraLife. You can head to the D&D page on Extra Life to find out more.

Extra Life unites thousands of gamers around the world to play games in support of their local Children's Miracle Network Hospital. Since its inception in 2008, Extra Life has raised more than $30 million for sick and injured kids. Sign up today and dedicate a day of play for kids in your community!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
